newsitem.title: LEBANON: Bank of Lebanon issues CDs worth 84 bln pounds.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Lebanon issues CDs worth 84 bln pounds.

text.p: The Bank of Lebanon issued on Thursday certificates of deposit dated May 9 to commercial banks worth 84 billion Lebanese pounds.
The bank sold 60-day certificates worth 80 billion Lebanese pounds at 12.75 percent annual interest and 45-day CDs worth four billion pounds at 12 percent.
Last week the bank issued CDs totalling 45 billion pounds -- 60-day CDs worth 39 billion pounds and 45-day CDs worth six billion pounds at 12.75 percent and 12 percent interest respectively.
